name: almost
posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 几乎，差不多，差一点，将近

example.eg: It was almost six o'clock when he left.
I almost wish I hadn't invited him.
example.egtrans: 我甚至有点希望自己没邀请他。

example.eg: It'll cost almost as much to repair it as it would to buy a new one.
example.egtrans: 修理要花的钱差不多都可以买个新的了。

example.eg: Almost all the passengers on the ferry were French.
example.egtrans: 渡船上的乘客几乎都是法国人。

example.eg: They'll almost certainly forget to do it.
example.egtrans: 几乎可以肯定他们会忘记做这件事的。

example.eg: The town was almost entirely destroyed during the war.
example.egtrans: 战争期间，这个城市几乎完全被夷为平地。

example.eg: We were bitten by mosquitoes almost every night.
example.egtrans: 几乎每天晚上我们都挨蚊子叮。

example.eg: The boat sank almost immediately after it had struck the rock.
example.egtrans: 船撞到岩石上，几乎一瞬间就沉了。

example.eg: Most artists find it almost impossible to make a living from art alone.
example.egtrans: 多数艺术家发现几乎不可能只靠艺术谋生。
